text:
This is a big moment for Ben
and a pivotal moment for his journey.

What Maya is about to do next will lay the 
groundwork for our entire ending.

Maya. I imagine that your mind is made up, 
but nevertheless,
we must still hear from Ben and Jessica.
Yeoman, bring the mallet.

Jessica and Ben, you must now beg the holder 
of the horns to spare you from sacrifice.
You have thirty seconds to plead your case.
Jessica, you will go first.
Your time starts now.

If we can just not count this
against my time really quick,

I am will be suing whoever
drew that picture of me.
This is an absolute defamation of character.

And, like, it's just seriously
so inaccurate, okay.
Maya, um, you may join my force.

That offer still stands. I just feel like I've 
been so selfless.

When it was your birthday, 
producers came up to me.

They were like, okay, your half birthday is in two months. 
Do you want to push these together?

And I said, no, let Maya have her day
and I just feel like,
let me have mine.

Thank you. Jessica.
Ben, it's your turn.
Maya. First time in these clamps.

I have no stress. You are the most beautiful soul, 
out of any one of these goats here.

If it is stressing you at all, 
please smash my urn.
And I promise there will be no hard feelings.
Wow, what an open heart this dude has.

I get emotional talking about this because it 
really moved me. You know, just that.
The kind of selflessness.
You deserve to win this. I love you.
You're the goat.
It was a really touching moment.
Like I saw a lot of humanity in Ben.
Thank you, Ben.

Now it's time to find out who will be the next person 
to be sacrificed in the Goat USA.
The holder of the horns.
It is time to make your decision.
It is a dream to be here.

I want to win this game so badly 
because I know it will change every aspect of my life.

And Ben, you have been such an amazing 
friend to me this whole time.

And I just know in my heart
I cannot smash your urn.
She makes the decision to save me.
And it was a beautiful moment.

You know, I've only known Maya for nine days now, 
and she's like my guardian angel.
Oh my God. Can I go?
Jessica, get back in there.
Just get back in.
Yeoman, please remove Ben from the clamps.
But you know, Maya loves this game.
And I see so much of myself in her.
Congratulations, Ben.
Thank you, Cat.
So, I feel extremely blessed in the moment.
And I respect her a lot.

I'm glad that I was the one
who got to do it, you know?
Because I know how much I care for him.
